ovdesc.p: This ‘T’ table contains the list FT ID's which are generated as part of Inward PAIN transactions.
Each FT record has the Key for SEPA.INWARD application to which the FT ID is linked

desc.p: This field holds the ID of SEPA.INWARD record to which the FT is linked
The value is updated from SEPA.EXEC.INWARD.CB
